text.content: Click a Lesson to learn more about Teaching Resources.
Teaching Tools contains printable PDFs of helpful teaching resources. Some of the resources to look for include objectives and key messages, lesson outlines, and handouts.
Click the photo below to hear a professional's comments.

audio.transcript: Teaching Tools contains printable PDFs of helpful teaching resources. Some of the resources to look for include objectives and key messages, lesson outlines, and handouts. Let's listen to how one professional was able to use these resources to help teach a workshop. Click the photo below to hear her comments.

text.content:
"Last month I was teaching a workshop on praise to young parents in the community so I decided to look through the Parenting Counts Teaching Tools to see if they could help me in my planning. I found the objectives and key messages to be very helpful in guiding my goals for the workshop and in helping me recognize the key points I wanted my learners to take home.

"The lesson outline helped me cover the content effectively within my time frame, and the parents loved the handouts and activities because they had something to take home with them as a reminder of the new parenting skills they learned."

â€”Marla

audio.transcript: Last month I was teaching a workshop on Praise to young parents in the community so I decided to look through the Parenting Counts Teaching Tools to see if they could help me in my planning. I found the objectives and key messages to be very helpful in guiding my goals for the workshop and in helping me recognize the key points I wanted my learners to take home. The lesson outline helped me cover the content effectively within my time frame, and the parents loved the handouts and activities because they had something to take home with them as a reminder of the new parenting skills they learned.
